long_description: The women's Tecnica Ten.2 95 ski boots feature a medium flex with roomy, 102mm lasts for intermediates seeking excellent comfort during all-day, all-mountain skiing. Soft, flexible shell over insteps makes it easy to spread shell, put boots on and go ski. Women-specific features such as the flared scalloped calf adapter and velvet fur lining enhance comfort and warmth. Anatomical shell shape holds the foot securely while providing a comfortable fit. Cuff alignment matches the angle of the cuff with the shape of the lower leg, increasing comfort and performance. The women's Tecnica Ten.2 95 ski boots feature a medium flex suited to intermediate skiers.
short_description: The women's Tecnica Ten.2 95 ski boots feature a medium flex with roomy, 102mm lasts for intermediates seeking excellent comfort during all-day, all-mountain skiing.
